item.title: 2016 Phase V Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: 2016 was another stellar growing season in Napa Valley and this Phase V Cabernet Sauvignon is a perfect representation. The color is a dense, dark violet, displaying layers of blackberry, currants, and cassis on the nose. The palate explodes with luscious ripe black fruits, baking spice, and a kiss of French oak, concluding with a long lingering finish that makes you want more. The 2016 Phase V Cabernet Sauvignon has a skillful balance of firm tannins and bright acidity, making this wine ready to enjoy today or capable of aging over the next 10-15 years.- Philippe Melka, Winemaker96 Points - Lisa Perrotti-Brown, Robert Parker Wine Advocate, Dec. 2018

item.title: 2016 Phase V Cellarium 1.5l
item.description: The 2016 Cellarium is a striking, deep, inky purple with lighter hues of maroon along the rim. The fruit forward aromas begin with black current and ripe blackberries and transform into bright red fruits, leaving you craving a rich dark chocolate bar with dried cranberries. As the wine opens, it reveals aromas of tobacco, cloves, fresh brioche and cured charcuterie. The alluring palate is lush with black cherry and cherry cola and mixed with hints of black pepper and cloves. Savory herbs and tobacco cry out to be paired with a summertime BBQ or a delicious seared ribeye. The mouthwatering finish leaves you begging for more as you witness subdued power evolve into well-structured, full bodied splendor. We can’t wait to see how this wine unfolds over the next decade.

item.title: 2017 Phase V Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description:
Intensity from start to finish! The color is a very dark garnet, with a vibrant blue-purple edge where wine meets glass. Aromas of red and black fruit, barrel spices and delicate floral notes show first, with subtle earthiness playing in the background. With a sip, big lush fruit notes are immediately prominent, as cherry, blackberry, and boysenberry dance. Graham cracker and tobacco follow, joining the fruit more than replacing it. Tannins are soft and plush from beginning to end, allowing the marvelous fruit flavors to linger.
- Philippe Melka, Winemaker
92 Points – Antonio Galloni and Wine Spectator

item.title: 2017 Phase V Cellarium 1.5l
item.description: The 2017 Cellarium is absolutely stunning in its youth, and has an equally gorgeous future ahead. The wine is dark and inky violet in the glass, with subtle aromas of cassis, blueberries and sweet oak, but the pallet is where the real magic happens! Bright fruit combines with sun-warmed leather, cedar and graphite, then you are pulled on an adventurous discovery of alluring cardamom and comforting fresh berry cobbler. The tannins are incredibly approachable, considering the commanding 52% of the blend that is Petite Sirah, and the body is sumptuous and remarkable. This wine finishes luxuriously long and silky smooth, giving you time to savor every last drop. You will want more! Good thing it comes in 1.5L bottles.

item.title: 2018 Phase V Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Provide an artist with multiple colors and they can do beautiful things! The 2018 Cabernet Sauvignon shows the pleasure of blending. The bouquet reveals a quiet power with blackberries, blueberries, and chocolate anchored by a beautiful rich earthiness. The palate is bold and balanced, lacing fruit with hints of black licorice, crushed gravel, and baking cocoa. The tannins have density and energy in thoughtful combination, revealing elements of the full range of fruit styles grown across our phenomenal collection of vineyards. - Philippe Melka, Winemaker94+ Points - Antonio Galloni and Wine Spectator

item.title: 2018 Phase V Cellarium 1.5l
item.description: The hue of the 2018 Cellarium is an impressive inky violet. The blend of characteristics from the Petite Sirah and Cabernet Sauvignon is so inviting with notes of mocha, dusty oak and cured meat. You’re immediately drawn into the first sip to reveal complex notes of creme de cassis, raspberry incense and chocolate ganache. The finish is lively and long with both brightness and richness. This wine is made to share with friends and family over decades.

item.title: 2019 Phase V Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description:
The 2019 Phase V Cabernet Sauvignon is one of those wines that absolutely bombards your senses with descriptors! Not in an overpowering way, but just….WOW! The color is dark, but vibrant, with flashes of violet and purple and ruby. The nose takes you from an Asian market to deep in a redwood forest. Aromas of herbs, tobacco, black fruit, mushroom, lilac, sweet fennel, moist wood, dark cocoa and spearmint pop from the glass. The palate explodes with lovely, velvety layers of chocolate covered plum, ripe boysenberry and wild blueberry, sitting beautifully amidst strong and luscious tannins. And then the finish, satiny and silky…. well, it really doesn’t seem to want to stop at all!
- Philippe Melka, Winemaker
96 Points – Robert Parker Wine Advocate

item.title: 2019 Phase V Cellarium 1.5l
item.description:
The 2019 Cellarium is an intense, deep, inky purple, which looks as though it might stain the glass! Rich aromas of plum abound, with subtle notes of lavender and eucalyptus playing in the background. On the palate, the wine shows impressive flavors of cranberry, cedar, licorice and dark chocolate that interact with powerful, yet well integrated, tannins. With its complex layers and beautiful structure, this wine can age for decades.
- Philippe Melka, Winemaker

item.title: 2023 Davis Estates Lily Fleur Rose
item.description: This beautiful Rosé of Pinot Noir, is named after Mike and Sandy's first granddaughter. The Lily Fleur Rose is a sight to behold, shimmering in the glass, coral toned with flecks of gold! This is a perfect summer wine!

item.title: 2014 Phase V Petite Sirah
item.description: The 2014 Phase V Petite Sirah is a beautiful deep purple color with a violet fringe. There are notes of tobacco, cigar box, blueberry, graphite and a touch of black pepper on the nose. The palate hints at sweetness and is rich with bacon, vanilla and blackberry. The full-bodied mouth feel is soft and silky with well-integrated tannins that linger gracefully and lead to a long juicy finish. This Petite Sirah is showing splendidly but has a lot more to give and will age exquisitely for many years.-Philippe Melka, Winemaker

item.title: 2016 Phase V Petite Sirah
item.description: The 2016 Phase V Petite Sirah is a classic example of an under-the-radar varietal. The color is a dense, deep, dark plum approaching inky. Aromas of currant, huckleberry, tobacco, and sweet vanilla awaken the senses. The palate comes alive with the ripe flavors of blueberries and blackberries, truffles, and a subtle hint of bacon! The firm tannin structure and vibrant acidity of the Phase V Petite Sirah will enable this wine to continue to evolve for years to come.- Philippe Melka, Winemaker94 Points - Lisa Perrotti-Brown, Robert Parker Wine Advocate, Dec. 2018

item.title: 2017 Phase V Petite Sirah
item.description:
Our 2017 Phase V Petite Sirah is a deep inky purple, reminiscent of the dark nights sky. Aromas of sweet vanilla, warm spices, dried roses and blueberry yogurt arouse the senses. Dried cranberries and boysenberry liquor mingle with rich mocha and roasted dark chocolate on your pallet. This wine showcases what we love most about Petite Sirah; depth of fruit, color, full and broad tannins that support a well-structured distinct varietal with a long lingering finish.
- Philippe Melka, Winemaker

item.title: 2018 Phase V Petite Sirah
item.description: The 2018 Phase V Petite Sirah has a rich, deep purple inky allure. Expressive nose of ripe strawberry, blueberry jam and spices. The mouthwatering notes of plum, blackberries and black cherry mix with cocoa powder for a truly sensational combination on the palate. This Petite Sirah is one of the most elegant made to date with a silky mouthfeel and a hint of sweet tannins that equipoise the robust variety. It is incredibly balanced and will age beautifully over the next 10 plus years.- Philippe Melka, Winemaker94 Points - Lisa Perrotti-Brown, Robert Parker Wine Advocate, Dec. 2018

item.title: 2019 Phase V Petite Sirah
item.description: No wine does big and inky better than Petite Sirah, and the 2019 Phase V shows all of it! Dark and alluring color, diverse and elegant flavors, and rich and powerful tannins! The palate pops with juicy black fruit, mingled with luscious strawberry jam, roasted coffee bean and earthy goodness, all trailed by lingering mineral and herb. The creamy texture and incredible polished tannins build to an amazing crescendo. This delicious young wine is showing exciting potential at a very early age!- Philippe Melka, Winemaker94 +Points - Robert Parker Wine Advocate94 Points - Jeb Dunnuck

item.title: 2019 Phase V Petite Sirah 1.5l
item.description: No wine does big and inky better than Petite Sirah, and the 2019 Phase V shows all of it! Dark and alluring color, diverse and elegant flavors, and rich and powerful tannins! The palate pops with juicy black fruit, mingled with luscious strawberry jam, roasted coffee bean and earthy goodness, all trailed by lingering mineral and herb. The creamy texture and incredible polished tannins build to an amazing crescendo. This delicious young wine is showing exciting potential at a very early age!- Philippe Melka, Winemaker94 Points – Jeb Dunnuck94+ Points – Robert Parker Wine

item.title: 2021 Davis Estates Classic Chase
item.description: One of our member's favorite wines is back The Classic Chase, named after Mike and Sandy's first grandson, this elegant blend of Cabernet Franc and Merlot is even better then we remember it!

item.title: 2021 Davis Estates Classic Chase
item.description: One of our member's favorite wines is back The Classic Chase, named after Mike and Sandy's first grandson, this elegant blend of Cabernet Franc and Merlot is even better then we remember it!

item.title: 2022 Davis Estates Sauvignon Blanc
item.description: Our 2022 Sauvignon Blanc splashes into a glass with a lively, golden-blonde show of fun and energy. It draws you in further with bright aromas of Fuji apple and sweet clementine. It completes the invitation to party with a palate dancing with a refreshing balance of tangy grapefruit, granny smith apple and banana. The perfect wine to pair with a trip to the beach, a picnic in the park, or just a lazy warm day at home on the patio!

item.title: 2015 Phase V Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The 2015 Phase V Cab has a gorgeous garnet color and is loaded with aromas of wild berries, licorice, and cardamon. In the mouth, a sophisticated palate with layers of chocolate, dark cherry, vanilla bean, dry sage and cinnamon. Full bodied with a velvety texture and great length.- Philippe Melka, Winemaker95 Points – Lisa Perrotti-Brown, Robert Parker Wine Advocate, Dec. 2017

item.title: 2019 Phase V Cabernet Sauvignon 1.5l
item.description:
The 2019 Phase V Cabernet Sauvignon is one of those wines that absolutely bombards your senses with descriptors! Not in an overpowering way, but just….WOW! The color is dark, but vibrant, with flashes of violet and purple and ruby. The nose takes you from an Asian market to deep in a redwood forest. Aromas of herbs, tobacco, black fruit, mushroom, lilac, sweet fennel, moist wood, dark cocoa and spearmint pop from the glass. The palate explodes with lovely, velvety layers of chocolate covered plum, ripe boysenberry and wild blueberry, sitting beautifully amidst strong and luscious tannins. And then the finish, satiny and silky…. well, it really doesn’t seem to want to stop at all!
- Philippe Melka, Winemaker
96 Points – Robert Parker Wine Advocate

item.title: 2022 Davis Estates Chardonnay
item.description: Breezes drifting though the south end of Napa Valley carry marine air in from the San Francisco Bay, which makes the Carneros region a great place for a wine like the 2022 Chardonnay to develop. The cool temperatures allow plenty of sunshine kisses to create a beautiful golden honey color to lure you in, while at the same time maintaining a tangy acidity that makes the wine dance on your tongue. Aromas of key lime and butterscotch, and flavors of citrus, vanilla and subtle minerality round out this very enjoyable wine!

item.title: 2022 Davis Estates Pinot Noir
item.description: Spritely…… Precocious….. Napa Carneros is certainly the coolest growing area in the valley, but it still turns out a Pinot noir with some oomph! Our 2022 Pinot noir showcases this style in glorious fashion. It has the shine and color of highly-polished, sun-darkened mahogany. Mellow aromatics of clove and cedar fill the bowl of the glass. Notes of black tea, red plum and dried cranberry parade through the flavor profile. All of these elements are balanced on the great structure that is the foundation of this wine.

item.title: 2015 Phase V Petite Sirah
item.description: Our 2015 Petite Sirah is deeply hued, inky with an alluring nose of plum, mulberry and charcuterie. The palate is savory and complex with notes of bacon, pencil lead, ripe black currant, blackberry, and violet complimented by long-lived chalky yet structured tannins.- Philippe Melka, Winemaker94 Points – Lisa Perrotti-Brown, Robert Parker Wine Advocate, Dec. 2017

item.title: 2019 Phase V Cabernet Sauvignon 3l
item.description:
The 2019 Phase V Cabernet Sauvignon is one of those wines that absolutely bombards your senses with descriptors! Not in an overpowering way, but just….WOW! 96 Points – Robert Parker Wine Advocate

item.title: 2021 Davis Estates Cabernet Franc
item.description: The lesser known wing-man to Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet franc can manifest in many different ways, depending on where it is grown, turning it into a favorite toy for winemaker playtime. Our 2021 Cabernet franc is an amazingly soft and approachable blend from vineyards scattered across Napa Valley. It has deep, rich color and the aromatics are a wonderful balance of dried cocoa, cherry and wet stone. The palate is medium-bodied and serves up flavors of almond, dried cranberry and warm hazelnut.

item.title: 2019 Davis Estates Zephyr
item.description: Our 2019 Zephyr is a truly wonderful expression of a fine Bordeaux blend, from the opening with its deep plum color all the way to an elegant finish. Ripe aromas of cherry lead on the nose, while delicate cocoa powder and leather elements complete the bouquet. Rich fruit shines on the palate, with depth built on savory earth components, dark chocolate cherries and cinnamon. The aromas and flavors of this exceptional blend sit atop a structure of soft and refined tannins. This wine will stand the test of time!

item.title: 2019 Davis Estates Zephyr
item.description: Our 2019 Zephyr is a truly wonderful expression of a fine Bordeaux blend, from the opening with its deep plum color all the way to an elegant finish. Ripe aromas of cherry lead on the nose, while delicate cocoa powder and leather elements complete the bouquet. Rich fruit shines on the palate, with depth built on savory earth components, dark chocolate cherries and cinnamon. The aromas and flavors of this exceptional blend sit atop a structure of soft and refined tannins. This wine will stand the test of time!

item.title: 2018 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Calistoga
item.description: The 2018 Calistoga Cabernet Sauvignon is yet again a truly amazing all-around wine of its appellation from the warmer upper valley. Opening with notes of candied red fruit, hints of warm baking spices and vanilla. Tasting the wine for the first time you are gratified with harmonious and mouth-filling fruits. Rich earthly flavors in the form of volcanic dust and dried herbs mingle with ripe raspberries, cranberries and cherry cola. This intense, yet youthful wine opens up in the glass as you continue to sip. The bold muscular tannins allow you to cellar this wine for years to come.

item.title: 2018 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Calistoga 1.5l
item.description: The 2018 Calistoga Cabernet Sauvignon is yet again a truly amazing all-around wine of its appellation from the warmer upper valley. Opening with notes of candied red fruit, hints of warm baking spices and vanilla. Tasting the wine for the first time you are gratified with harmonious and mouth-filling fruits. item.title: 2018 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Calistoga 6l

This intense, yet youthful wine opens up in the glass as you continue to sip. The bold muscular tannins allow you to cellar this wine for years to come.

item.title: 2018 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Oakville
item.description: The Mr Lincoln rose is an intense red with a velvety dusty appearance that is said to seduce the senses, that is the look of this 2018 Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon! There is an incredible richness to the nose. A swirl releases traces of floral perfume, combined with black fruit, cocoa and exotic spices, backed up by subtle notes of toasty oak. With each sip your palate is awakened by intense flavors of black cherry, tobacco, leather and dark chocolate. Soft, structured and very full tannins complete the taste experience, giving this wine a long and delicious finish.

item.title: 2019 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The 2019 Davis Estates Napa Valley Cabernet is an amazing example of what we are trying to do with this wine! It brings together elements of the vintage and characteristics of the fantastic vineyards and appellations from which we source fruit. The color is dark purple, with a crimson vibrancy in the glass. Aromas of blackberry, Burgundy plum, and cherry are framed by soft notes of toasted oak. Upon tasting, you discover a full-bodied wine with supple texture and delicate tannins, lively flavors of cassis, cherry, and plum, and beautiful spice heightened by barrel aging.

item.title: 2019 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Calistoga
item.description: The 2019 Calistoga Cabernet Sauvignon sparkles a dark, ruby red in the glass. The bouquet shows pomegranate and then subtle hints of fresh herbs and roses. Tasting reveals a bright acidity, with powerful flavors of dark cherry and blackberry followed by white pepper and dark chocolate. The upfront intensity of black fruit melds seamlessly with the bold structure of beautifully developed tannins. Now or later, this Cabernet will be ready to enjoy when you are!

item.title: 2019 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Calistoga
item.description: The 2019 Calistoga Cabernet Sauvignon sparkles a dark, ruby red in the glass. The bouquet shows pomegranate and then subtle hints of fresh herbs and roses. Tasting reveals a bright acidity, with powerful flavors of dark cherry and blackberry followed by white pepper and dark chocolate. The upfront intensity of black fruit melds seamlessly with the bold structure of beautifully developed tannins. Now or later, this Cabernet will be ready to enjoy when you are!

item.title: 2019 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Calistoga 6l

Tasting reveals a bright acidity, with powerful flavors of dark cherry and blackberry followed by white pepper and dark chocolate. The upfront intensity of black fruit melds seamlessly with the bold structure of beautifully developed tannins. Now or later, this Cabernet will be ready to enjoy when you are!

item.title: 2019 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Oakville
item.description: The 2019 vintage of our beloved Oakville Cabernet has a vivid garnet color that mesmerizes as you swirl. The aroma is alive with cinnamon, nutmeg, clove, and bay leaf, with delicate traces of spring flowers and west coast forest (think wild fennel, mustard, cedar, fir and redwood!) The first sip draws you in with flavors of dark chocolate covered cherries and soft sweet herbs. The strong silky tannins and rounded finish of this wine show its true power and finesse and hint at many years of fine aging to come.

item.title: 2019 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Oakville
item.description: The 2019 vintage of our beloved Oakville Cabernet has a vivid garnet color that mesmerizes as you swirl. The aroma is alive with cinnamon, nutmeg, clove, and bay leaf, with delicate traces of spring flowers and west coast forest (think wild fennel, mustard, cedar, fir and redwood!) item.title: 2019 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Rutherford
item.description: The 2019 Rutherford Cabernet Sauvignon, masterfully crafted by both Mother Nature and the Davis winemaking team, is a luscious portrait in dark ruby with sparkles of bright red and deep purple (the color, not the band!) Notes of black fruit, tarragon, bay leaf and vanilla bean create an aromatic palette that covers appetizer through dessert. With art being a full sensory immersion, the flavors and mouthfeel carry the story. Tastes of blackberry, boysenberry and black tea swirl with bright acidity and soft tannins to complete a wine that is a joy to behold.

item.title: 2019 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Rutherford
item.description: The 2019 Rutherford Cabernet Sauvignon, masterfully crafted by both Mother Nature and the Davis winemaking team, is a luscious portrait in dark ruby with sparkles of bright red and deep purple (the color, not the band!) item.title: 2021 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon

Upon tasting, you discover a full-bodied wine with supple texture and delicate tannins, lively flavors of cassis, cherry, and plum, and beautiful spice heightened by barrel aging.

item.title: 2019 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Howell Mountain
item.description: Coming off vineyards that sit at 1700-1800 feet above sea level certainly helps fruit down the path of becoming something along the lines of the 2019 Howell Mountain Cabernet! This wine has elegance, structure and power. The color is a deep, dark cherry, and the nose carries an essence of bay leaf and dried rose. Alluring hints of delicate herb and sultry spice mix with black raspberry and red plum on the palate. With aesthetic, body and flavor, this Cabernet shows amazing aging potential.

item.title: 2019 Davis Estates Cabernet Sauvignon Howell Mountain
item.description: Coming off vineyards that sit at 1700-1800 feet above sea level certainly helps fruit down the path of becoming something along the lines of the 2019 Howell Mountain Cabernet! This wine has elegance, structure and power. The color is a deep, dark cherry, and the nose carries an essence of bay leaf and dried rose. Alluring hints of delicate herb and sultry spice mix with black raspberry and red plum on the palate. With aesthetic, body and flavor, this Cabernet shows amazing aging potential.

item.title: 2014 Pinwheel Late Harvest Chardonnay
item.description: A floral nose of dried apricots, honeysuckle and peach; accented with nutmeg and sandalwood. The mouth is filled with intense flavors of nectarine, baked apple, and wild flower honey. Firm acidity provides a crisp finish of citrus and spice.

item.title: 2014 Pinwheel Late Harvest Cabernet Franc Dessert Wine
item.description: The Late Harvest Cabernet Franc has a deep, rich hue of red. The aromatics are filled with elegant smokey blackcurrant and cassis, and hints of spice. The flavors follow with currant and berry tones laced with nuances of spice and cassis. This Late Harvest is a lovely, elegant wine.
